item.title: Everything must have a beginning.
item.description: ‘There are things known and there are things unknown, and in between are the doors of perception.’ - Aldous Huxley. It’s always difficult to begin something, I find. It’s very easy to declare to yourself, ‘I’m going to do that thing that I’ve always wanted to do, and I’m going to start… wait for it… now!’ You might get a warm glow for a little while, flush with your own decisiveness and go-getter attitude, but in the heat of the moment, you never actually get around to doing anything at all.
